title: The influence of N95 and surgical masks on carbon dioxide levels: A comprehensive systematic review and meta-analysis
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Mahdi Nassri, Parviz Barari, Mohammad Khanizadeh, Sasan Faridi, Mansour Shamsipour, Kazem Naddafi, Sadegh Niazi, Mohammad Sadegh Hassanvand
